00025 #ifndef _BASE_VECTOR3_HPP_
00026 #define _BASE_VECTOR3_HPP_
00027 
00028 #include <iostream>
00029 #include <math.h>
00030 
00031 #include <base/base>
00032 #include <base/array>
00033 
00034 #ifdef USE_OSG
00035 #include <osg/Vec3>
00036 #endif

00038 
00039 namespace base {
00040 
00041 //class Triangle;
00042 
00043 
00044 class Vector3 
00045 {
00046 
00047 public:
00048   Vector3() { x=y=z=Real(0); }
00049   Vector3(Real xc, Real yc, Real zc) { x=xc; y=yc; z=zc; }
00050   Vector3(const Vector3& v) { this->operator=(v); }
00051 #ifdef USE_OSG
00052   Vector3(const osg::Vec3& v) { x=v._v[0]; y=v._v[1]; z=v._v[2]; }
00053 #endif
00054   ~Vector3() {}
00055 
00056   enum Coords { X=1, Y=2, Z=3, Coords3D=4 };
00057   
00058   void setZero() throw()
00059   { x=y=z=Real(0); }
00060 
00061   bool isZero() const throw()
00062    { return (x==0)||(y==0)||(z==0); }
00063 
00064   bool equalsZero(Real eps=base::epsilon)
00065   { return (base::equals(x,0,eps) || base::equals(y,0,eps) || base::equals(z,0,eps)); }
00066 
00067   Real& e(Int i) throw()
00068   { 
00069 #ifdef DEBUG
00070     if ((i < 1) || (i > 3))
00071       throw std::runtime_error(Exception("vector index out of bounds (debug only check)"));
00072 #endif 
00073     return (i==1)?x:(i==2)?y:z; 
00074   }
00075 
00076   const Real& e(Int i) const throw()
00077   {
00078 #ifdef DEBUG
00079     if ((i < 1) || (i > 3))
00080       throw std::runtime_error(Exception("vector index out of bounds (debug only check)"));
00081 #endif 
00082     return (i==1)?x:(i==2)?y:z; 
00083   }
00084 
00085   Real& at(Int i) throw(std::out_of_range)
00086   {
00087     if ((i < 1) || (i > 3))
00088       throw std::out_of_range(Exception("vector index out of bounds"));
00089 
00090     return (i==1)?x:(i==2)?y:z;
00091   }
00092 
00093   const Real& at(Int i) const throw(std::out_of_range)
00094   {
00095     if ((i < 1) || (i > 3))
00096       throw std::out_of_range(Exception("vector index out of bounds"));
00097 
00098     return (i==1)?x:(i==2)?y:z;
00099   }
00100 
00101   Real& operator[](Int i)  
00102   { return e(i); }
00103 
00104   const Real& operator[](Int i) const
00105   { return e(i); }
00106 
00107   Vector3& operator=(const Vector3& src) throw()
00108   { 
00109     if (&src != this) {
00110       x=src.x; y=src.y; z=src.z;
00111     }
00112     return *this;
00113   }
00114 
00115 
00116   bool operator==(const Vector3& v) const throw()
00117   {
00118     if (&v == this) return true;
00119 
00120     return ((x==v.x)&&(y==v.y)&&(z==v.z));
00121   }
00122 
00123   bool operator!=(const Vector3& v) const throw()
00124   {
00125     if (&v == this) return false;
00126 
00127     return ((x!=v.x)||(y!=v.y)||(z!=v.z));
00128   }
00129 
00130 
00131   bool equals(const Vector3& v, Real epsilon = base::epsilon) const throw()
00132   {
00133     if (&v == this) return true;
00134 
00135     return (base::equals(x,v.x,epsilon) && base::equals(y,v.y,epsilon) && base::equals(z,v.z,epsilon));
00136   }
00137 
00138 
00139   Real norm() const throw()
00140   { return (x*x+y*y+z*z); }
00141 
00142   Real magnitude() const throw()
00143   { return sqrt(norm()); }
00144 
00145   Real length() const throw()
00146   { return magnitude(); }
00147 
00148   Vector3& negate() throw()
00149   { x=-x; y=-y; z=-z; return *this; }
00150 
00151   Vector3& normalize()
00152   { Real l=length(); x/=l; y/=l; z/=l; return *this; }
00153 
00154   Real magNormalize()
00155   { Real l=length(); x/=l; y/=l; z/=l; return l; }
00156 
00157   Vector3& cross(const Vector3& p) throw() // this = thisxp
00158   { Vector3 r(y*p.z-z*p.y, -(x*p.z-z*p.x), x*p.y-y*p.x); return (*this=r); }  
00159   
00160   Vector3& cross(const Vector3& a, const Vector3& b) throw() // this = axb
00161   { *this=a; return cross(b); }
00162 
00163   Real dot(const Vector3& p) const throw()
00164   { return x*p.x+y*p.y+z*p.z; }
00165 
00166 
00167   Vector3& operator+=(const Vector3& v2) throw()
00168   { x+=v2.x; y+=v2.y; z+=v2.z; return *this; }
00169 
00170   Vector3& operator-=(const Vector3& v2) throw()
00171   { x-=v2.x; y-=v2.y; z-=v2.z; return *this; }
00172 
00173   Vector3& operator*=(const Real& s) throw()
00174   { x*=s; y*=s; z*=s; return *this; }
00175 
00176   Vector3& operator/=(const Real& s)
00177   { x/=s; y/=s; z/=s; return *this; }
00178 
00179   Int largestAxis() const {
00180     Real a[Y+1];
00181     Int axis = ( (a[X] = base::abs(x)) < (a[Y] = base::abs(y)) ) ? Y : X;
00182     return (a[axis] < base::abs(z)) ? Z : axis; 
00183   }
00184 
00185 
00186   const Real* c_array() const { return &x; }
00187   Real* c_array() { return &x; }
00188 #ifdef USE_OSG
00189   osg::Vec3 toVec3() const { return osg::Vec3(x,y,z); }
00190 #endif
00191 
00192   static Vector3 min(const base::array<Vector3>& vectors);
00193   static Vector3 max(const base::array<Vector3>& vectors);
00194   static void minmax(const base::array<Vector3>& vectors, Vector3& minimum, Vector3& maximum);
00195 
00196 
00197   Real x,y,z;
00198 
00199 };
00200

00202 // Operations
00203 
00204 inline Vector3 operator+(const Vector3& v1, const Vector3& v2) throw() // Addition
00205 { Vector3 r(v1); return r+=v2; }
00206 
00207 inline Vector3 operator-(const Vector3& v1, const Vector3& v2) throw() // Subtraction
00208 { Vector3 r(v1); return r-=v2; }
00209 
00210 inline Vector3 operator-(const Vector3& v1) throw() // Negation
00211 { Vector3 r(v1); return r.negate(); }
00212 
00213 inline Vector3 operator*(const Vector3& v1, const Real& s) throw() // Scalar multiplication
00214 { Vector3 r(v1); return r*=s; }
00215 
00216 inline Vector3 operator*(const Real& s, const Vector3& v1) throw() // Scalar multiplication
00217 { Vector3 r(v1); return r*=s; }
00218 
00219 inline Vector3 operator/(const Vector3& v1, const Real& s) // Scalar division
00220 { Vector3 r(v1); return r/= s; }
00221 
00222 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, const Vector3& v) // Output
00223 { return out << "(" << v.x << "," << v.y << "," << v.z << ")"; }
00224 
00225 
00226 inline Vector3 midpoint(const Vector3& v1, const Vector3& v2) throw() // midpoint between
00227 { Vector3 r(v1); r+=v2; return r/=2; }
00228 
00229 inline Vector3 cross(const Vector3& v1, const Vector3& v2) throw() // cross product v1xv2
00230 { Vector3 r(v1); return r.cross(v2); }
00231 
00232 inline Real dot(const Vector3& v1, const Vector3& v2) throw() // dot product v1.v2
00233 { Vector3 r(v1); return r.dot(v2); }
00234 
00235 inline Real operator*(const Vector3& v1, const Vector3& v2) // dot procuct v1.v2
00236 { return dot(v1,v2); }
